Headline: Loop-bound Pink Line Service Delayed at Cicero
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Pink Line trains are standing at Cicero due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Pink Line trains are standing at Cicero due to police activity.

  • Shuttle buses are available between 54th/Cermak and Pulaski to provide connecting service in both directions.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
